抹.definition: to plaster; to go around; to skirt

抹一鼻子灰.definition: lit. to rub one's nose with dust; to suffer a snub; to meet with a rebuff

抹不下臉.definition: to be unable to keep a straight face (idiom)

抹平.definition: to flatten; to level; to smooth out

抹殺.definition: to erase; to cover traces; to obliterate evidence; to expunge; to blot out; to suppress

抹淚.definition: to wipe away tears; (fig.) to shed tears

抹灰.definition: to plaster; to render (a wall); (fig.) to bring shame on; also pr. [mo4 hui1]

抹煞.definition: variant of 抹殺|抹杀[mo3 sha1]

抹胸.definition: old feminine garment, covering chest and abdomen

抹脖子.definition: to slit one's own throat; to commit suicide

抹零.definition: (of a seller) to round down the fractional part of a bill

抹黑.definition: to discredit; to defame; to smear sb's name; to bring shame upon (oneself or one's family etc); to blacken (e.g. commando's face for camouflage); to black out or obliterate (e.g. censored words)
